biotools.summary: Weighted Ensemble Solvent Accessibility.  Meta-predictor based on a weighted ensemble of five methods, for solvent accessibility of residues, using the protein sequence as input. It has an expected accuracy of 80% and the prediction can be used for structure prediction.

bioschemas.name: WESA
bioschemas.summary: Weighted Ensemble Solvent Accessibility.  Meta-predictor based on a weighted ensemble of five methods, for solvent accessibility of residues, using the protein sequence as input. It has an expected accuracy of 80% and the prediction can be used for structure prediction.
